nhc_headline: ...HONE TURNING TOWARD THE NORTH-NORTHWEST NEAR THE INTERNATIONAL DATE LINE.... ...TROPICAL STORM WATCHES CONTINUE FOR PORTIONS OF THE NORTHWEST  HAWAIIAN ISLANDS...
summary:
...HONE TURNING TOWARD THE NORTH-NORTHWEST NEAR THE INTERNATIONAL DATE LINE.... ...TROPICAL STORM WATCHES CONTINUE FOR PORTIONS OF THE NORTHWEST  HAWAIIAN ISLANDS...
 As of 11:00 AM HST Sat Aug 31
 the center of Hone was located near 22.7, -176.3
 with movement NNW at 7 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1007 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.
